articles.title: CT scans of toothed bird fossil leads to jaw-dropping discovery - The Guardian
articles.description: Dating back more than 65m years, specimen’s mobile palate challenges understanding of avian evolution
articles.content:
Fossil experts have cooked the goose of a key tenet in avian evolution after finding a premodern bird from more than 65m years ago that could move its beak like modern fowl.

articles.title: Cyborgs v 'holdout humans': what the world might be like if our species survives for a million years - The Conversation
articles.description: There may be humans who look more or less like us in the year million, but they won’t be alone.
